import { useDarkModeContext } from "../../context/DarkModeContext";รง export const ItemCart = ({item}) => { const {darkMode} = useDarkModeContext(); return (

{item.nombre} {item.modelo}

Cantidad: {item.cant}

Precio Unitario: ${new Intl.NumberFormat('de-DE').format(item.precio)}

Subtotal: ${new Intl.NumberFormat('de-DE').format(item.precio * item.cant)}

); }
